00020 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00021 
00022 void QMDatabase::onCreate()
00023 {
00024    // table for frames
00025     Exec("CREATE TABLE frames ("
00026         "_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,"
00027         "time REAL NOT NULL,"
00028         "step INT NOT NULL,"
00029         "box11 REAL NOT NULL,"
00030         "box12 REAL NOT NULL,"
00031         "box13 REAL NOT NULL,"
00032         "box21 REAL NOT NULL,"
00033         "box22 REAL NOT NULL,"
00034         "box23 REAL NOT NULL,"
00035         "box31 REAL NOT NULL,"
00036         "box32 REAL NOT NULL,"
00037         "box33 REAL NOT NULL)");
00038    
00039     // table for molecules
00040     Exec("CREATE TABLE molecules ("
00041         "_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,"
00042         "id INT NOT NULL,"
00043         "name TEXT NOT NULL,"
00044         "frame INT NOT NULL)");
00045       
00046     // table for conjugated segments
00047     Exec("CREATE TABLE conjsegs ("
00048         "_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,"
00049         "name TEXT NOT NULL,"
00050         "type TEXT NOT NULL,"
00051         "molecule INT NOT NULL,"
00052         "frame INT NOT NULL," // TODO: this is bad
00053         "pos_x real NOT NULL,"
00054         "pos_y real NOT NULL,"
00055         "pos_z real NOT NULL,"
00056         "occ REAL)"); 
00057 
00058     // additional properties of conjugated segments
00059     Exec("CREATE TABLE conjseg_properties ("
00060         "_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,"
00061         "conjseg INTEGER NOT NULL,"
00062         "key TEXT NOT NULL,"
00063         "value REAL NOT NULL)");
00064 
00065     // table for rigid fragments
00066     Exec("CREATE TABLE rigidfrags ("
00067         "_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,"
00068         "id INT NOT NULL,"
00069         "frame INT NOT NULL,"
00070         "name TEXT NOT NULL,"
00071         "symmetry INT NOT NULL,"
00072         "type TEXT NOT NULL,"
00073         "resnr INT NOT NULL,"
00074         "mass REAL NOT NULL,"
00075         "charge REAL NOT NULL,"
00076         "molecule INT NOT NULL,"
00077         "conjseg_id INT NOT NULL,"
00078         "conjseg_index INT NOT NULL,"
00079         "pos_x REAL NOT NULL,"
00080         "pos_y REAL NOT NULL,"
00081         "pos_z REAL NOT NULL,"
00082         "u_x REAL NOT NULL,"
00083         "u_y REAL NOT NULL,"
00084         "u_z REAL NOT NULL,"
00085         "v_x REAL NOT NULL,"
00086         "v_y REAL NOT NULL,"
00087         "v_z REAL NOT NULL)");
00088 
00089     // additional properties of rigid fragments
00090     Exec("CREATE TABLE rigidfrag_properties ("
00091         "_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,"
00092         "fragmenttid INTEGER NOT NULL,"
00093         "key TEXT NOT NULL,"
00094         "value REAL NOT NULL)");
00095                
00096     // table for pairs
00097     Exec("CREATE TABLE pairs ("
00098         "_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,"
00099         "conjseg1 INT NOT NULL,"
00100         "conjseg2 INT NOT NULL,"
00101         "rate12 REAL NOT NULL,"
00102         "rate21 REAL NOT NULL,"
00103         "r_x REAL NOT NULL,"
00104         "r_y REAL NOT NULL,"
00105         "r_z REAL NOT NULL,"
00106         "deleted INT DEFAULT 0)");
00107 
00108     // additional properties of pairs
00109     Exec("CREATE TABLE pair_properties ("
00110         "_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,"
00111         "pair INTEGER NOT NULL,"
00112         "key TEXT NOT NULL,"
00113         "value REAL NOT NULL)");
00114 
00115     Exec("CREATE TABLE pair_integrals ("
00116         "pair INTEGER NOT NULL,"
00117         "num INTEGER NOT NULL,"
00118         "J REAL NOT NULL)");
00119 
00120
